import { useState } from "react" export const Address=()=>{ const currentAddress={ firstName:localStorage.getItem("firstName"), lastName:localStorage.getItem("lastName"), city:localStorage.getItem("city"), state:localStorage.getItem("state"), country:localStorage.getItem("country"), pinCode:localStorage.getItem("pin"), phone:localStorage.getItem("phone") } const [address,setAddress]=useState({ firstName:"", lastName:"", phone:"", city:"", state:"", country:"", pinCode:"", }); const [showAddressForm,setShowAddressForm]=useState(false); const {firstName,lastName,city,state,country,pinCode,phone}=currentAddress; const submitForm=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); } const updateAddress=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); setAddress({...currentAddress}); } console.log(showAddressForm); return <>

Shipment Address

setAddress({...currentAddress})}>

{`${firstName} ${lastName}`}

{phone}
{`${city},${state},${country}`}

Pin Code:{pinCode}

setShowAddressForm(true)}> Add a new address

}
